Package com.goldasil.pjv.models

Class GameModel

java.lang.Object
com.goldasil.pjv.models.GameModel
public class GameModel
extends java.lang.Object
Represents model for the game play. Holds the states of the basic entities in the game - players, a stock, a waste.

    GameModel()

    Adds a new player with the specified ID to the game.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameModel

      public GameModel()

  • Method Details

    • playMove

      public void playMove​(int playerID, MoveDTO move)
      Makes all changes (of the states of the entities of the game) caused by a specific move according to the type of the move.
      Parameters:
      playerID - ID of the player who made the move
      move - the move to process

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer​(int playerID)
      Adds a new player with the specified ID to the game.
      Parameters:
      playerID - ID of the new player

    • popDrawnFromStock

      public void popDrawnFromStock​(int numCardsDrawn)
      Pops the specified number of cards a player had drawn from the stock.
      Parameters:
      numCardsDrawn - number of cards to pop

    • dealCards

      public void dealCards()
      Deals the cards to the players. Additionally, it sets the stock and waste.

    • afterMoveCheck

      public void afterMoveCheck()
      Checks the state of the stock after each move. Turns the waste over if the stock is empty.

    • getPlayers

      public java.util.List<Player> getPlayers()
      Gets the players playing in the game.
      Returns:
      a list of players

    • getStock

      public java.util.LinkedList<Card> getStock()
      Gets the stock of the game.
      Returns:
      a list of cards in stock

    • setStock

      public void setStock​(java.util.LinkedList<Card> stock)
      sets the stock of the game.
      Parameters:
      stock - a list of cards in stock

    • getWaste

      public java.util.LinkedList<Card> getWaste()
      Gets the waste of the game
      Returns:
      a list of cards in the waste

    • setWaste

      public void setWaste​(java.util.LinkedList<Card> waste)
      Sets the waste of the game
      Parameters:
      waste - a list of cards in the waste
